Conteudo: In the March Meeting, the Banco Central do Brasil's Monetary Policy Committee (Copom) decided to reduce the Selic target by 75 basis points to 16.50 percent, without bias. Six votes were for the Copom monetary policy action, while three votes were in favor of reducing the Selic target by 100 basis points. The Portuguese version of the March Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, March 16.
